Serialized Form

Nested Class Summary
(package private)  class Battleship.ExitListener
          ExitListener asks for the user to confirm they want to exit the system if user selects yes then exit system
(package private)  class Battleship.loadListener
          loadListener loads the previous save game file from the last game, even if Battleship GUI was closed.
(package private)  class Battleship.rulesListener
          rulesListener asks for the user to confirm they want to view the rules.txt file if user wants to view rules, call mainMenuDirector with parameter 4 displays file in notepad.
(package private)  class Battleship.startListener
          startListener creates and initilises a new version of the game.

Constructor Detail

Battleship

public Battleship()

Method Detail

Battleship_GUI

public void Battleship_GUI()
Battleship_GUI Creates a GridLayout and sets the North, South, East,West and Center Panels. Header Panel creates a new Image and add this image to header Panel. West panel creates a padding label to ensure that the layout remains consistent and adds to panel. Center Panel creates 4 buttons, adds action listeners and is added to the panel East Panel creates a padding label and adds to panel. FooterPanel creates a new image and adds this to the footer panel. All backgrounds for panels are set to black and content is added to pane. Title is set and frame is set to exit on close

Parameters:
none -

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main Method Creates new instance of Battleship and sets window ( frame ) to equal new instance of Battleship.

mainMenuDirector

public static void mainMenuDirector(int menuChoice)
mainMenuDirector Uses menu System from console version of Battleship. Accepts a int parameter to select the option from the menu. Menu allows for system to select if to : Start new game , Load Game, Rules, Exit, Continue Game and calls appropriate methods

Parameters:
int - menuChoice
